    1  ls
    2  ls -l
    3  cd GitExamples
    4  ls
    5  cd
    6  cd GitExamples
    7  git clone https://github.com/geriosmanii/datauncertainty.git
    8  cd datauncertainty
    9  nano test
   10  nano test.txt
   11  git add -A
   12  git commit -m "Showing the class github"
   13  git commit -m "Showing the class github"
   14  git config --global user.email "gosmani@email.wm.edu"
   15  git config --global user.email "gosmani@email.wm.edu" user.name "geriosmanii"
   16  git commit -m "Showing the class github"
   17  git config --global user.email "gosmani@email.wm.edu"
   18  git config --global user.name "geriosmanii"
   19  git commit -m "Showing the class github"
   20  git commit -m "Showing the class github"
   21  git push
   22  nano test
   23  git pull
   24  history
   25  history > todays_commands.txt
